summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the functionality of the Security Account Manager Remote (SAMR) protocol operations, including connecting to the server, handling domain objects, creating and deleting users, groups, and aliases, enumerating accounts, managing memberships, changing passwords, and querying or setting security and account information.
business_intent: To ensure the correctness, stability, and security of SAMR implementations used for account and domain management, supporting development, regression testing, and compliance verification of authentication and authorization services.
